model_answer: The answer is C: [00:01:59 - 00:03:26]. In this time segment, the AAS auditorium has a large screen showing space imagery and a slide reading about exoplanet demographics, while a female speaker excitedly talks about “the emerging picture of planet populations” and building “a complete census of planets in our galaxy”.

The correct answer is C: [00:04:30 - 00:04:57]. The group poses by a glass door as shown on-screen text promoting Tuesday, Sunset Tavern in Ballard, 8 pm! and the woman announces their show on the same day at the same venue.
